name: CLKRelativeDateTextProvider
desc: A formatted string that conveys the difference in time between the current date and a date that you specify.

items.name: init(date: Date, style: CLKRelativeDateStyle, units: NSCalendar.Unit)
items.desc: Creates a text provider that shows the difference between the current time and the specified date.

items.name: init(date: Date, relativeTo: Date?, style: CLKRelativeDateStyle, units: NSCalendar.Unit)
items.desc: Creates a text provider that shows the difference in time between the provided dates.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The target date to use for calculations.

items.name: var relativeToDate: Date?
items.desc: The end date that the text provider uses when calculating a fixed, relative date.

items.name: var relativeDateStyle: CLKRelativeDateStyle
items.desc: The formatting style to use for the relative time value.

items.name: var calendarUnits: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: The calendar units to include in the formatted string.

items.name: enum CLKRelativeDateStyle
items.desc: Constants indicating the formatting style for the relative date values.
